name: Add new Google Forms responses as records in Airtable
description: Streamline your data collection process by automatically transferring responses from Google Forms to Airtable. With this template, every time a new response is submitted in Google Forms, Make will create a corresponding record in Airtable, ensuring your data is organized and easily accessible. Perfect for managing surveys, event registrations, or feedback forms, this integration enhances your workflow efficiency and keeps your information centralized.
